rows.label: fev11_380_130_msg0001
rows.name:
For a place out in the back of beyond,
it doesn't seem all that bad.

rows.label: fev11_380_130_msg0002
rows.name:
Look at all this lush scenery! I think
I could live here quite comfortably.

rows.label: fev11_380_130_msg0003
rows.name: It warms my heart to hear you say so.

rows.label: fev11_380_130_msg0004
rows.name:
I like it here too. I've been thinking
about dabbling in a bit of architecture
here someday.

rows.label: fev11_380_130_msg0005
rows.name:
We'd better finish Metsu off quickly
then, so you can run off and live life
as a hermit!

rows.label: fev11_380_130_msg0006
rows.name: That's the plan.

rows.label: fev11_380_130_msg0007
rows.name: Will we be staying here a while?

rows.label: fev11_380_130_msg0008
rows.name:
Long enough to gather some intel on
Metsu. Plus, there are a few things I
need to sort out with the resistance.

rows.label: fev11_380_130_msg0009
rows.name:
That suits me just fine. If you don't
mind, I think I'll go for a stroll.

rows.label: fev11_380_130_msg0010
rows.name:
Understood. Thank you all for acting
in the interests of His Majesty.

rows.label: fev11_380_130_msg0011
rows.name: Where are you off to, Hugo?

rows.label: fev11_380_130_msg0012
rows.name:
A regiment of ours has been tasked
with disarming remnant Shiyan troops
at a nearby archipelago.

rows.label: fev11_380_130_msg0013
rows.name:
My presence there has been requested
so that I may inspire them.

rows.label: fev11_380_130_msg0014
rows.name:
And inspired they will be. It would
take a stone heart not to be touched
by your selfless courage.

rows.label: fev11_380_130_msg0015
rows.name:
It goes both ways, Adel. I also
wish to express my gratitude for
their unceasing efforts.

rows.label: fev11_380_130_msg0016
rows.name:
Wadatsumi will act as my bodyguard.
Kagutsuchi I'd like you to stay here as
a point of contact

rows.label: fev11_380_130_msg0017
rows.name:
Don't go running off without me
once you've discovered Metsu's
whereabouts, now.

rows.label: fev11_380_130_msg0018
rows.name:
What, and face him without His
Majesty's prodigious talents? It
would be foolhardy in the utmost.

rows.label: fev11_380_130_msg0019
rows.name:
I'm honored that you think so.
All right. I will return shortly.

rows.label: fev11_380_130_msg0020
rows.name: Hold the fort Kagutsuchi.

rows.label: fev11_380_130_msg0021
rows.name:
I'll be fine, as long as you take
care of His Majesty, Wadatsumi.

rows.label: fev11_380_130_msg0022
rows.name:
Right then, let's see if we can't iron
out a few of these problems the
resistance has been having.

rows.label: fev11_380_130_msg0023
rows.name:
Is that something we can help with?
Shin and I would be happy
to help. Right, Shin?

rows.label: fev11_380_130_msg0024
rows.name: Of course. If that's what you want.

rows.label: fev11_380_130_msg0025
rows.name:
Thanks, both of you. You'll be a big
help.

rows.label: fev11_380_130_msg0026
rows.name:
The biggest problem we've got right
now is a lack of provisions.

rows.label: fev11_380_130_msg0027
rows.name: What, food provisions?

rows.label: fev11_380_130_msg0028
rows.name:
I'm afraid so. Like you said, this place
is cut off from the rest of the world.
It's no wonder they're so hard up.

rows.label: fev11_380_130_msg0029
rows.name:
I think making sure our army doesn't
die of starvation is more important than
finding Metsu right now, don't you?

rows.label: fev11_380_130_msg0030
rows.name: Yes, very wise.

rows.label: fev11_380_130_msg0031
rows.name:
History has proven many a time
that the victors are those who have
been fed and rested well.

rows.label: fev11_380_130_msg0032
rows.name:
Just so! We should start by talking
to Ivan, as he's the one who divvies
up the rations. Shall we?
